const response = await client.indices.analyze({
  tokenizer: "whitespace",
  filter: [
    {
      type: "stop",
      stopwords: ["a"],
    },
    {
      type: "shingle",
      filler_token: "+",
    },
  ],
  text: "fox jumps a lazy dog",
});
console.log(response);
